steps.step: This recipe can be baked or fried. We did both.Preheat the oven to 400 degrees.Coat a non-stick sheet with the olive oil (if baking) or heat the oil in a frying pan (if frying). Slice the tilapia filets into one inch strips
Whisk the egg in a shallow bowl

Place the breadcrumbs in a second bowl and mix in the cheese, zest and pepper.Dip the fish into the egg and then coat with the breadcrumbs.When baking, cook for 10-15 minutes, turning once to brown on both sounds. The tilapia should be a milky white to signal that it is cooked through.If frying, cook about 3 minutes per side or until the fish flakes with a fork
